course_title: Current Topics in Medical Genetics Research

001.comments: Journal Clubs descriptions are posted on the Medical Genetics website under "Current Students - Courses". All Journal Clubs will be conducted online for term 1 of 2020W (and possibly for term 2 - to be confirmed later).Registration is blocked. MEDG and non-MEDG students obtain permission from the Journal Club coordinator, then email Cheryl Bishop at medical.genetics@ubc.ca for registration in MEDG 545.

002.comments: Contact Cheryl Bishop at medical.genetics@ubc.ca for registration procedure.

003.comments: January-start students (MEDG  and  non-MEDG students): Contact Cheryl Bishop at medical.genetics@ubc.ca for registration procedure.

description: Critical discussion of current primary research literature in medical genetics.
